title: Speaking And Writing English Effectively
headline: Improve your English as you master various writing styles and explore famous literature in this free online course.
description: This course equips you with heightened English language skills, boosting your confidence and ability to communicate with different audiences. Being able to speak and write well is a powerful ability that opens professional and personal doors. This course teaches you how to choose the right tone and voice in different moments and introduces you to proven techniques used for presentations, imaginative writing and journalistic issue analysis.
courseDescription:
Effective communication skills open doors. Both in business and your personal life, an idea that is clearly and quickly communicated is more likely to be taken seriously, reducing frustration for speakers and listeners. The ability to choose the right tone and voice (both spoken and written) in different moments can give you the ability to put people at ease, excite them or just hold their attention. These are valuable skills that empower you to persuade and convince those around you.

This course sets you on your path to becoming a master communicator. We compare a variety of literary styles, including creative and opinion writing. We then establish the importance of audience and situation assessment to help you understand when to apply particular styles and registers. The course explains how to use language effectively and covers recognized techniques used for presentations, imaginative writing and issue analysis. This equips you with the communication skills required to navigate a wide range of situations and contexts.

Many people lack these advanced language skills and may never even consider pursuing them. The fact that you‘ve read this far means that you’re not one of them and clearly have an interest in polishing your English abilities. This course can quickly provide the skills you seek to leave you in control of everyday situations as these skills apply in many contexts. Sign up to improve your communication skills and take your English to the next level.
